stimulusHtml: In The Jungle, Wifredo Lamâ€™s depiction of enigmatic figures with mask-like faces in a surrealistic landscape has been interpreted as a reference to the
choicesHtml: historical oppression of the indigenous population in Cuba
political tension between the governments of Cuba and the United States
struggles with assimilation faced by modern Cuban immigrants in the United States
creation of an Afro-Cuban identity against the cultural background of slavery
